ch.ethz.khammash.ode

Class BufferEventFunctionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.khammash.ode.BufferEventFunctionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventFunction

    public class BufferEventFunctionAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventFunction
    This class takes an EventFunction and provides an equivalent EventFunction implementation that is backed by buffers suitable for solvers that make use of JNI (by using direct buffers).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferEventFunctionAdapter(EventFunction ef, int vectorFieldDimension, java.nio.DoubleBuffer xBuffer, java.nio.DoubleBuffer valuesBuffer)
      Instantiates a new direct buffer adapter for an EventFunction.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void computeEventValues(double t)
      Compute the event/root values based on the time t and the state in the state buffer and store it in the event/root values buffer
      void computeEventValues(double t, double[] x, double[] values)
      Compute the event/root values.
      int getNumberOfEventValues()
      Gets the number of event/root values.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferEventFunctionAdapter

        public BufferEventFunctionAdapter(EventFunction ef,
                          int vectorFieldDimension,
                          java.nio.DoubleBuffer xBuffer,
                          java.nio.DoubleBuffer valuesBuffer)
        Instantiates a new direct buffer adapter for an EventFunction.
        Parameters:
        ef - the EventFunction
        vectorFieldDimension - the dimension of the Ode vector field
        xBuffer - the buffer for the state
        valuesBuffer - the buffer for the event/root values (will be modified by later calls)
